overview:
Liat is a passionate entrepreneur who always seeks ways to make life work better and easier. As the Co-Founder of 24me, she aims to revolutionize the way people manage their day to day life.

Prior to 24me, Liat founded AKEMEE, a tailored consulting solutions company (NY based), which provided services for companies who entered the U.S market and went through growth process.

Her background includes working for several successful technology firms that had offices around the world including the U.S. Liat was responsible for customer management of Fortune 500 companies in North America and was leading the operational arm inside those companies.

Liat Holds a B.A. in Computer Science from the IDC Herzliya Israel, and graduated the first Entrepreneurship program founded by Sam Zell of Chicago. She holds an Executive International MBA from St. Louis University in U.S.A.
